title: New dynamic queue = Gang abuse of power
body:
So if you solo Q now.  Be ready to get reported if you dont do EXACTLY what the 4 man team wants you to do.
Your jungler tries to gank when you are at 30% and under turret and he is at 50% while Zed is at 100% and he dies because he was a stupid moron for trying to gank and you were smart and didnt engage to give Zed 2 kills.  BOOM you are reported

You are support and your 4 man ADC goes all ham and gets killed BOOM reported for not saving him.

You are top and didnt TP bot to help in the 4 man gank on your teams over extend BOOM reported.

You are jungling and every lane wants you to camp their lane as they feed over and over BOOM reported.

You have no way to def vs these reports other then getting the other team to report your team but that is unlikely.
Or your team will ask the other team to report you for stuff you never did because your team all tell the other side you did.

Riot $#@!ed up with this dynamic queue without thinking through all the brat players that life in LOL to do nothing but be trolls.

There is no place for a solo Qer to do in LOL

replies.body: you dont pay attention at all do you. Riot announced that they are making Solo Queue (as in you can't even duo) a seperate ladder than Dynamic. http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/HGblb9fH-the-2016-ranked-season-updates-on-dynamic-ranked-and-your-feedback
best thing ive literally ever read.

Hey Lord Tulkus,

I'll just keep this short; You have absolutely nothing to worry about because Riot designed their systems to not be affected by this. Go to [Riot Lyte's ask.fm page](https://ask.fm/RiotLyte), CTRL+F and search for "report" and just read through a few of his answers on reporting.

-DTN

Getting reported by multiple sources in one game carries the same weight as getting one report; premade trolls cannot gang up on you. Moreover, reports by themselves don't  do anything unless the player did anything punishment-worthy.

God, what is with you people throwing fits about 4-man premades like they're a boogieman out to ruin exactly 100% of your games?
